content: Hey Vimo, good to see you. Your portfolio's looking healthy with that Orthoanalytics win locked in and seven thousand monthly recurring, but we've got some housekeeping that can't wait â€” you've got duplicate projects cluttering the view, three AURA variants and multiple Global Foundation entries that need to be consolidated today. Once we clean that up, I'll dive into the Kavach AI vault and help you figure out which concepts are actually ready to move forward.
